alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALLS POSSIBLE IN WESTERN AREAS OF GARRETT, ALLEGANY, GRANT, AND MINERAL COUNTIES EARLY THIS MORNING... Snow squalls are possible through 430 AM as a cold front moves across the Mid Atlantic. Affected locations will see rapidly changing weather and road conditions, with brief heavy snow and gusty winds. A quick snow accumulation up to one inch is possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Be prepared for areas of blowing snow that reduce visibility and result in hazardous driving conditions. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on.
